generated_description: narcanÂ® nasal spray 4mg is a medical product developed by emergent biosolutions canada inc. it is an intranasal form of naloxone hydrochloride, used for the emergency treatment of opioid overdose. the spray is indicated for use in individuals experiencing respiratory and/or severe central nervous system depression due to opioid poisoning. it is available at no cost to residents of the northwest territories, ontario, quebec, and the yukon, as well as to clients of veteran affairs canada, first nations health authority in british columbia, and non-insured health benefits program clients in all other provinces and territories. the product is intended to be administered by a non-healthcare professional until professional medical help arrives.
